# Test data for field extraction
# Format: separator-delimited data with various edge cases

# Basic colon-separated
a:b:c

# Pipe-separated
field1|field2|field3|field4

# Custom separator (double colon)
value1::value2::value3

# With empty fields
a::c
::b::

# With special characters
"quoted:value":normal:$special

# Multi-character separator test
data1<shtracer_separator>data2<shtracer_separator>data3

# Tab-separated (actual tab character)
col1	col2	col3	col4	col5

# Space-separated (multiple spaces)
word1 word2  word3   word4

# Mixed delimiters on different lines
path/to/file.txt:100:some data
another/path.sh:200:more:data:here
